price: 2. Degenen die, als zij iets afwegen de volle maat eisen.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
